entry.title: Lumio EDU Mission Statement
entry.content:
This is the English site of Lumio Education, and it is for demo purposes only at this time. The main target students of Lumio EDU right now are Chinese students in the poverty regions of China, so all English learning materials post at this site are in Chinese. However, we are open to new ideas, advices and cooperations, if you would like to be part of our team or wanted to get connected, please feel free to reach out to us!

Founder’s words-Why lumio

As the founder and president of iHelp, a student organization at my school that sends volunteers to remote parts of China to teach English, I have taught English in secluded, rural areas of China and have hosted charity bazaars to raise money for underfunded schools and poor families within these areas. My eagerness to curtail educational disparities between rural and urban China has also inspired me to launch Lumio, an online teaching platform that provides free English courses taught by volunteer teachers like myself. Thus, even students in the most secluded areas of China can access quality English instruction through their computer or mobile device.

Looking at the earth from space,

you can’t see the earth boundary,

you can’t see the national boundary.

People should not be limited by these invisible lines.

At Lumio Online Teaching Platform,

our teachers come from all over the world, and our students come from all over China.

Maybe in the future we’ll have students all over the world.

Because no matter where you come from,

if you want to learn, our teachers are ready to help you.

As human beings, We are all the same in essence; we are all brothers and sisters.

entry.title: Lumio English-New Concept English Course Intro（Level III）
entry.content:
Lumio English Level III - New Concept English Course Syllabus

此系列课程将教授有关于以新概念英语为教材的全英文听力&阅读理解，在学生有一定的英文基础上并能稍微掌握基本语法情况下，教师会开始提高词汇难度，教更加复杂的句式表达和更灵活的语法运用。

初步课程成型后的教学目标如下：

 - 能听懂部分英文基础对话和问句，形成肌肉记忆，并作出正确的英文回答
 - 能用纯正美国口语化的方式做全英文的简单对话并做到接近0%的语法错误，做到能在短时间内构思想法并用英文表达出来
 - 能看懂部分长难句，明白基础语法词性在句中的定位
 - 掌握部分分析句式结构的能力
 - 在词汇量增多后能写出更表达化的句式，而不再是断断续续的短语或者2-3个单词形成的简单句
 - 能写出对5种疑问句的正确回答格式

Course Features：
老师将会从不同的英文听力动画和阅读的材料来帮助学生摄入词汇量并学习语法。为了避免增添课程趣味，老师们会设计与众不同的教案，教授正宗西方的传统文化，以及用风趣的教学特色让学生们提起对英语学习的兴趣，让不一样的语言习惯成为他们生活的一部分，而不是仅仅局限于考试和课本。

If you still have question regarding the course or want to know more about it, please read the detailed course syllabus down below:
  - Lumio English - New Concept English(LevelIII)

  2. Introduce first person singular possessive adjectives and its grammar rules.(my)
  3. Understand and distinguish the ‘Be’ verbs “am”, “is”, and “are”.
  4. Understand the plural forms of ‘Be’ verbs.

entry.title: Lumio English Speaking Course Intro (Level II)
entry.content:
Lumio English Level II - English Speaking Syllabus

This Lesson is designed for childern (grade 2-4) with some forehand English learning experience, the level II course for Lumio English Basics. The average age of sutdents in this class is 9-10 years old, here is a biref outline about the course:

  1. 自我介绍：能够熟练掌握年龄、颜色和服饰的相关单词，并能够组成简单的句子
  2. 家庭：能够熟练掌握家庭成员和职业相关单词，学会一些简单形容人特征的单词，能够组成句子介绍自己的家庭
  3. 美食：能够熟练掌握蔬菜水果、肉类、甜点相关单词，学习一些简单的点餐用语
  4. 学校：能够掌握表示方位、文具、学科相关单词，能够介绍不同房间的位置
  5. 时间：能够掌握表示具体时间、日期的单词，能够简单介绍一天干的事情
  6. 旅行：能够掌握表示国家、天气、以及描述环境相关单词，能够询问他人路线

Course Features：
学生不仅将通过大量的口语和发音练习来熟练掌握授课知识，从小培养孩子们的语感，同时课程会包含多样化的线上互动小游戏来增添孩子们对英文的兴趣。同时，我们的授课老师大多是美国留学生，他们将采用美国课堂的多互动，多鼓励的教学方式进行授课，以此减少课程的枯燥性。

Please reference the following requirements to determine if this is the right course for your child：

 - Student is proficient with the 26 Engligh alphabat.
 - Student is proficient in a few basic English greeting.(ex:hello, nice to meet you, good morning, etc.)
 - Student has studied English for more than half a year.
 - Student knows a few basic English vocabulary.(ex:apple, cat, dog, etc.)
 - Student is interested in learning more English grammar and futher improve their basic English writing skills.

If you still have question regarding the course or want to know more about it, please read the detailed course syllabus down below:
  - Lumio English Speaking Syllabus(Level II)

entry.title: Lumio English Writing Course Intro (Level II)

This Lesson is designed for childern (grade 2-4) with some forehand English learning experience, the level II course for Lumio English Basics. The average age of sutdents in this class is 9-10 years old, here is a biref outline about the course:

  1. Understand first person subject and its object form.
  2. Understand first person possessive adjectives and related sentence structures.
  3. Understand ‘Be’ verbs and related sentence structures.
  4. Understand the grammar rules for both the third person sigular and plural pronouns.
  5. Understand the grammar rules for present progressive tense and related sentence structures.
  6. Understand present indefinite tense and related sentence structures.
  7. Understand and distinguish between verbs, adjectives and nouns.
  8. Understand propositions and quantifiers.

Course Features：
Students are going to do a lot of sentence practices and writings to better understand the material. However, in order to make the online class more interesting, our teachers (mostly Chinese who study abroad in the U.S.) are going to adopt the American classroom teaching style, which is oriented in interaction and encouragement

 - Student has studied English for more than half a year.
